Section.Catchline: Long-term care managed care technical advisory workgroup.

Subsection.Text: Before August 1, 2011, the agency shall establish a technical advisory workgroup to assist in developing:

Paragraph.Text: The method of determining Medicaid eligibility pursuant to s. 409.985(3).
The requirements for provider payments to nursing homes under s. 409.983(6).
The method for managing Medicare coinsurance crossover claims.
Uniform requirements for claims submissions and payments, including electronic funds transfers and claims processing.
The process for enrollment of and payment for individuals pending determination of Medicaid eligibility.

Subsection.Text: The advisory workgroup must include, but is not limited to, representatives of providers and plans who could potentially participate in long-term care managed care. Members of the workgroup shall serve without compensation but may be reimbursed for per diem and travel expenses as provided in s. 112.061.
This section is repealed on June 30, 2013.
